headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Rockwell Automation (ROK) After Its Strong Share Price Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether Rockwell Automation is priced for perfection or still offers value, you are not alone. The stock’s recent run has put valuation firmly in the spotlight. The share price recently closed at US$421.65, with returns of 0.9% over 7 days, 8.4% over 30 days, 5.8% year to date, 53.9% over 1 year, 53.2% over 3 years and 89.1% over 5 years. This naturally raises questions about what is already reflected in the price. Recent news flow around Rockwell Automation has focused...
